verbose_text: Intracellular glutathione assay : The SKOV3 cells were cultured in 96-well plates at a density of 5000 cells / well overnight and treated with 100 muL of NP-cRGD+ US, cisplatin, Pt (IV), Pt (IV) NPs, Pt (IV) NPs+ US, Pt (IV) NP-cRGD and Pt (IV) NP-cRGD+ US at an equivalent concentration of 30 muM for 48 h, and the total intracellular glutathione level was determined with an assay kit (Beyotime Biotechnology Company, Jiangsu, China).
